license.name: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International

items.name: DeepDefender
items.description: DeepDefender is an AI-powered security tool for real-time threat detection using machine learning models. It integrates computer vision for video analysis and provides a simple web interface for monitoring. The project uses frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and OpenCV to enhance system protection.

items.name: dacapo
items.description: A framework for easy application of established machine learning techniques on large, multi-dimensional images.

items.name: MLOps-Pipeline-Framework
items.description: A generic end-to-end machine learning pipeline framework supporting multiple types of data and learning tasks

items.name: Master-Thesis
items.description: This repository contains a document that reviews popular frameworks for deploying Machine Learning models, focusing on efficiency, compatibility, and performance in production environments.

items.name: Metropolitan-SurrogateModel
items.description: A machine learning framework for efficient metropolitan-scale urban flood prediction combining network clustering with Random Forest surrogate models.

items.name: Chronic-Kidney-Disease-Prediction
items.description: A machine learning framework that predicts the prevalence of a specific chronic disease or health risk factor from digital records of online behavior

items.name: Machine-Learning-Deep-learning-Pipelines
items.description: End-to-end Machine Learning and Deep Learning pipelines from data preprocessing to model evaluation. Includes tools for cleaning data, feature engineering, model training, and performance evaluation. Modular and scalable, supporting frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn.

items.name: Chemsy
items.description: A Minimalistic Automatic Framework for Chemometrics and Machine Learning

items.name: HenriAI
items.description: HenriAI is a custom fine-tuned conversational AI model built using GPT-Neo. It demonstrates my skills in AI development, including dataset curation and optimization techniques. The project focuses on creating engaging, human-like interactions and showcases my ability to work with advanced machine learning frameworks.

items.name: FEDOT
items.description: Automated modeling and machine learning framework FEDOT

items.name: ransomware_detection_framework
items.description: A comprehensive framework for ransomware detection and mitigation, integrating AI, machine learning, and multi-layered defense strategies
